title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: End of Summer GTA$ Giveaway
content:
Now through September 17, anyone who plays GTA Online will receive a special GTA$ cash infusion.

Everyone gets a one-time GTA$1,000,000 boost, while GTA+ Members will receive an additional GTA$1,000,000 (including anyone who subscribes and plays between August 21 and September 17).

GTA$ bonuses will hit your account within 72 hours of logging in.
